There are many ways to keep your shower door clean and streak free. Using a squeegee after showering will effectively keep the glass clean, and vinegar is great for dissolving mineral streaks on metal shower frames.

It is illegal in California to dispose of single-use batteries in the trash can. Please tape household battery terminals. Recycle all household batteries at a participating library, grocery store or household hazardous waste facility.
If the light contains mercury, it is hazardous.
